DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval, rule.Rule_ID, CASE SUBSTR (PRA.GNRTD_RULE_ID, 1, 1) WHEN '#' THEN 'UM Rule' WHEN '&' THEN 'Exclusion Rule' WHEN '*' THEN 'Denial Rule' END AS RULE_TYP_DESC, rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR,rule.TAG,rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,'' BENEFITCOMPONENT,'' BENEFIT, rlDt.EXCLSN_IND , rlDt.CLM_TYPE ,rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC, rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE , rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE , rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID , rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR , rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND, rlDt.DLR_LMT , rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST , rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY , rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE ,rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2,rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE,rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD , rlDt.TT_CD , rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD , rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD , rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY, rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2 ,rlDt.CPAY_IND , rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND,rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD,rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT ,rlDt.SRVC_END_DT ,rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND,rlDt.DRG_CD,rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND ,rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND,rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID,rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR,rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR,rlDt.BLNG_NPI,rlDt.RNDR_NPI,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL,rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL ,rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR , rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD , rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rcls.CLM_TT_CD , rcls.CLM_POS_CD , rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND ,rcls.CLM_DIAG_IND,rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND, rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR , rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH,rule.RULE_GRP_IND,rule.RULE_SHRT_DESC,rule.RULE_APRVD_DT FROM Rule rule JOIN PROD_RULE_ASSN pra on rule.rule_id = pra.rule_id AND SUBSTR(pra.GNRTD_RULE_ID,1,1) {1} --AND rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule rule join PROD_RULE_ASSN rdt on rdt.rule_id =rule.rule_id ) JOIN CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN CRA ON pra.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID = CRA.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID and CRA.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_dat rldt ON rldt.rule_id = rule.rule_id LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR and rule.WPD_DEL_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY RULE_TYP_DESC ,rule.rule_id,rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR,rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR,rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR DESC

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval, rule.RULE_ID,'Header Rule' RULE_TYP_DESC,rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR,rule.TAG,rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,BNFT.BENEFITCOMPONENT BENEFITCOMPONENT, BNFT.BENEFIT BENEFIT, rlDt.EXCLSN_IND , rlDt.CLM_TYPE ,rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC, rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE , rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE , rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID , rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR , rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND, rlDt.DLR_LMT , rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST , rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY , rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE ,rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2,rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE,rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD , rlDt.TT_CD , rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD , rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD , rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY, rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2 ,rlDt.CPAY_IND , rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND,rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD,rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT ,rlDt.SRVC_END_DT ,rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND,rlDt.DRG_CD,rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND ,rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND,rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID,rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR,rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR,rlDt.BLNG_NPI,rlDt.RNDR_NPI,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL,rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL ,rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR , rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD , rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rcls.CLM_TT_CD , rcls.CLM_POS_CD , rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND ,rcls.CLM_DIAG_IND,rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND, rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR , rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH,rule.RULE_GRP_IND,rule.RULE_SHRT_DESC,rule.RULE_APRVD_DT FROM Rule rule JOIN (SELECT d.rule_id,f.bnft_cmpnt_nm BENEFITCOMPONENT,'' BENEFIT FROM PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN d,cntrct_dt_sgmnt e, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr f, (select distinct dt_sgmnt_sys_id, bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag from cntrct_bnft_assn where DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F') assn WHERE e.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and d.prod_sys_id = e.prod_sys_id and f.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and assn.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = e.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and d.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = assn.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and assn.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' UNION ALL SELECT d.rule_id, h.bnft_cmpnt_nm BENEFITCOMPONENT, e.BNFT_ID_NM BENEFIT FROM cntrct_bnft_rule_ovrd d, BMST_BNFT_MSTR e ,cntrct_bnft_assn g, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr h WHERE d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and g.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = g.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = h.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and d.BNFT_SYS_ID = g.BNFT_SYS_ID and g.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' and d.BNFT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_SYS_ID) BNFT ON BNFT.RULE_ID = rule.RULE_ID AND rule.RULE_TYP_CD = 'WPDAUTOBG' AND rule.WPD_DEL_FLAG = 'N' --AND rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule rule,Rule_dat rdt where rdt.rule_id =rule.rule_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_dat rldt ON rldt.rule_id = rule.rule_id LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY RULE_TYP_DESC,rule.RULE_ID, rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR DESC

SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM AS KEYVAL,rule.rule_id,grp.grp_rule_id , CASE RULE_TYP_CD WHEN 'UMRULE' THEN 'UM Rule' WHEN 'ADJUD' THEN 'Exclusion Rule' WHEN 'BNFTDENY' THEN 'Denial Rule' WHEN 'WPDAUTOBG' THEN 'Header Rule' END AS RULE_TYP_DESC, rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR,rule.TAG,rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,'' BENEFITCOMPONENT,'' BENEFIT, rlDt.EXCLSN_IND ,rlDt.CLM_TYPE ,rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC,rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE ,rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE ,rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID ,rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD ,rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT ,rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR ,rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND,rlDt.DLR_LMT ,rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST ,rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY ,rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD ,rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE ,rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2,rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE,rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD ,rlDt.TT_CD ,rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD ,rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD ,rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY,rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2,rlDt.CPAY_IND,rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND,rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD,rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT ,rlDt.SRVC_END_DT ,rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND,rlDt.DRG_CD,rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND ,rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND,rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID,rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR,rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR,rlDt.BLNG_NPI,rlDt.RNDR_NPI,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL,rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL ,rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL,rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR ,rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD ,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 ,rcls.CLM_TT_CD ,rcls.CLM_POS_CD ,rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND,rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND, rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR ,rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL ,rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH, rule.RULE_APRVD_DT,rule.RULE_GRP_IND,rule.RULE_SHRT_DESC,rule.RULE_TYP_CD FROM Rule rule JOIN GRP_RULE grp on grp.rule_id = rule.rule_id and grp.WPD_DEL_FLAG = 'N' and grp.grp_rule_id {0} JOIN rule_dat rldt ON rldt.rule_id = rule.rule_id --AND rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule rule,Rule_dat rdt where rdt.rule_id =rule.rule_id ) LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY RULE_TYP_DESC,rule.RULE_ID ,rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR DESC

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,rlDt.RULE_ID,'' RULE_TYP_DESC,rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR,rule.TAG,rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR, '' BENEFITCOMPONENT,'' BENEFIT, rlDt.EXCLSN_IND , rlDt.CLM_TYPE , rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC, rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE , rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE , rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID , rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR , rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND, rlDt.DLR_LMT , rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST , rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY , rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE ,rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2,rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE,rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD , rlDt.TT_CD , rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD , rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD , rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY, rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2 ,rlDt.CPAY_IND , rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND,rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD,rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT ,rlDt.SRVC_END_DT ,rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND,rlDt.DRG_CD,rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND ,rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND,rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID,rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR,rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR,rlDt.BLNG_NPI,rlDt.RNDR_NPI,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL,rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL ,rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR , rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD , rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rcls.CLM_TT_CD , rcls.CLM_POS_CD , rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND ,rcls.CLM_DIAG_IND,rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND, rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR , rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rule.RULE_GRP_IND,rule.RULE_SHRT_DESC,rule.RULE_APRVD_DT FROM Rule rule JOIN rule_dat rldt ON rldt.rule_id = rule.rule_id AND rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule where rule_id={0} ) AND rldt.rule_id={0} LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR,rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR,rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR DESC

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,rlDt.RULE_ID,'' RULE_TYP_DESC,rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR,rule.TAG,rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR, '' BENEFITCOMPONENT,'' BENEFIT, rlDt.EXCLSN_IND , rlDt.CLM_TYPE , rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC, rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE , rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE , rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID , rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR , rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND, rlDt.DLR_LMT , rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST , rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY , rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE ,rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2,rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE,rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD , rlDt.TT_CD , rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD , rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD , rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY, rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2 ,rlDt.CPAY_IND , rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND,rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD,rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT ,rlDt.SRVC_END_DT ,rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND,rlDt.DRG_CD,rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND ,rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND,rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID,rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR,rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR,rlDt.BLNG_NPI,rlDt.RNDR_NPI,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL,rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL ,rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR , rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD , rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rcls.CLM_TT_CD , rcls.CLM_POS_CD , rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND ,rcls.CLM_DIAG_IND,rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND, rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR , rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rule.RULE_GRP_IND,rule.RULE_SHRT_DESC,rule.RULE_APRVD_DT FROM Rule rule JOIN rule_dat rldt ON rldt.rule_id = rule.rule_id AND rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule where rule_id={0} ) AND rldt.rule_id={0} LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR,rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR,rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR DESC

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,rlDt.RULE_ID, '' RULE_TYP_DESC, rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR,rule.TAG,rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR, (SELECT BNFT_CMPNT_NM FROM BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR WHERE BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} ) BENEFITCOMPONENT, '' BENEFIT,rlDt.EXCLSN_IND , rlDt.CLM_TYPE , rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC, rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE , rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE , rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID , rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR , rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND, rlDt.DLR_LMT , rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST , rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY , rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE ,rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2,rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE,rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD , rlDt.TT_CD , rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD , rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD , rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY, rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2 ,rlDt.CPAY_IND , rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND,rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD,rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT ,rlDt.SRVC_END_DT ,rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND,rlDt.DRG_CD,rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND ,rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND,rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID,rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR,rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR,rlDt.BLNG_NPI,rlDt.RNDR_NPI,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL,rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL ,rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR , rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD , rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rcls.CLM_TT_CD , rcls.CLM_POS_CD , rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND ,rcls.CLM_DIAG_IND,rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND, rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR , rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rule.RULE_GRP_IND,rule.RULE_SHRT_DESC,rule.RULE_APRVD_DT FROM Rule rule JOIN rule_dat rldt ON rldt.rule_id = rule.rule_id AND rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule where rule_id={0} ) AND rldt.rule_id={0} LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR,rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR,rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR DESC

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,B.Rule_ID,'Header Rule 'RULE_TYP_DESC, B.RULE_VRSN_NBR,B.TAG,rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,BNFT.BENEFITCOMPONENT BENEFITCOMPONENT, BNFT.BENEFIT BENEFIT, rlDt.EXCLSN_IND , rlDt.CLM_TYPE ,rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC, rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE , rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE , rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID , rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR , rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND, rlDt.DLR_LMT , rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST , rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY , rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE ,rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2,rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE,rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD , rlDt.TT_CD , rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD , rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD , rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY, rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2 ,rlDt.CPAY_IND , rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND,rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD,rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT ,rlDt.SRVC_END_DT ,rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND,rlDt.DRG_CD,rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND ,rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND,rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID,rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR,rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR,rlDt.BLNG_NPI,rlDt.RNDR_NPI,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL,rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL ,rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR , rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD , rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rcls.CLM_TT_CD , rcls.CLM_POS_CD , rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND ,rcls.CLM_DIAG_IND,rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND, rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR , rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH,B.RULE_GRP_IND,B.RULE_SHRT_DESC,B.RULE_APRVD_DT FROM RULE B JOIN (SELECT d.rule_id,H.BNFT_CMPNT_NM BENEFITCOMPONENT,E.BNFT_ID_NM BENEFIT FROM PROD_BNFT_RULE_OVRD D, BMST_BNFT_MSTR E , (SELECT DISTINCT PROD_SYS_ID,BNFT_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_HIDE_FLAG FROM PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD WHERE BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F') G, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR H WHERE D.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND D.PROD_SYS_ID = G.PROD_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = H.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = H.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND G.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID UNION ALL SELECT d.rule_id,f.bnft_cmpnt_nm BenefitComponent,'' Benefit FROM PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN d, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr f where d.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND F.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ) BNFT ON BNFT.RULE_ID = B.RULE_ID AND B.RULE_TYP_CD = 'WPDAUTOBG' AND B.WPD_DEL_FLAG = 'N' --AND B.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule rule,Rule_dat rdt where rdt.rule_id =rule.rule_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN RULE_DAT rldt ON rldt.RULE_ID =B.RULE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY RULE_TYP_DESC,B.RULE_ID,rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR DESC

SELECT dbms_random.random as keyval,rule.rule_id, CASE SUBSTR (PR.GNRTD_RULE_ID, 1, 1) WHEN '#' THEN 'UM Rule' WHEN '&' THEN 'Exclusion Rule' WHEN '*' THEN 'Denial Rule' END AS RULE_TYP_DESC, rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR,rule.TAG,rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,'' BENEFITCOMPONENT,'' BENEFIT, rlDt.EXCLSN_IND , rlDt.CLM_TYPE ,rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC, rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE , rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE , rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID , rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR , rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND, rlDt.DLR_LMT , rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST , rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY , rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE ,rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2,rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE,rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD , rlDt.TT_CD , rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD , rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD , rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY, rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 ,rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2 ,rlDt.CPAY_IND , rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND,rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD,rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT ,rlDt.SRVC_END_DT ,rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND,rlDt.DRG_CD,rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND ,rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND,rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID,rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR,rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR,rlDt.BLNG_NPI,rlDt.RNDR_NPI,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD,rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL,rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL ,rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL ,rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR , rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD , rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1,rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rcls.CLM_TT_CD , rcls.CLM_POS_CD , rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND ,rcls.CLM_DIAG_IND,rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND, rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR , rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL ,rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND ,rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW ,rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH,rule.RULE_GRP_IND,rule.RULE_SHRT_DESC,rule.RULE_APRVD_DT FROM Rule rule JOIN PROD_RULE_ASSN PR on pr.rule_id = rule.rule_id and rule.WPD_DEL_FLAG = 'N' and PR.PROD_SYS_ID ={0} and SUBSTR(PR.GNRTD_RULE_ID,1,1) {1} --AND rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule rule join PROD_RULE_ASSN rdt on rdt.rule_id =rule.rule_id ) LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_dat rldt ON rldt.rule_id = rule.rule_id
LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY RULE_TYP_DESC,rule.RULE_ID ,rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR DESC
